channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge denies embattled government-funded agency's restraining order request against DOGE
item.description: The U.S. Institute for Peace's temporary restraining order request against DOGE was denied by Judge Beryl Howell on Wednesday, though she criticized D...

item.title: Pro-Union Republicans Don’t Get Trump’s Real Appeal
item.description: Democrats have lost the working class in large part because they put unions over workers. Republicans shouldn’t make the same mistake.

item.title: Disgraced ex-Congressman Weiner receives campaign donation from unexpected New Yorker in new race
item.description: Anthony Weiner received donations to his campaign for City Council of New York City from ex-wife Huma Abedin and her sister, Heba Abedin, according to...

item.title: Netanyahu gifts Fetterman a silver-plated beeper after he praised Israel's Lebanon pager operation
item.description: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu gave Sen; John Fetterman a silver-plated pager during his visit this week.

item.title: The Most Important China Book of the Decade
item.description: Tom Cotton brings to a mass audience a critical message about Beijing’s threats.

item.title: The Chief Justice Needs To Stop Taking PR Cues From Meghan Markle
item.description: The Meghan Markle strategy of issuing press releases to make people take you seriously is no way to run a Supreme Court.

item.title: Thoughts on Federal Arts Money After President Autopen
item.description: And why wallop libraries? They teach people to think for themselves.

item.title: FBI whistleblower punished by Biden regime gets new chance for justice in Trump era
item.description: The tide may have turned for an FBI whistleblower who has been battling the bureau for more than two years since he was stripped of security clearance...

item.title: Valley Girl Federal Judge Cites Broadway Play, Rips Up Constitution In Trans Soldiers Screed

item.title: Feds making more than 300 payments a day in USAID funds after court battle

item.title: An Unwelcome Fight Over Obeying Court Orders
item.description: Even the righteous cause of deporting brutal Venezuelan gangs should not tempt the executive branch to undermine the legitimate role of courts.

item.title: Justice Department tells judges to stop second-guessing Trump on deportation flights

item.title: If Anyone’s Destroying The Judiciary’s ‘Legitimacy,’ It’s Chief Justice John Roberts
item.description: Roberts' attempts to preserve what he views as the judiciary's 'legitimacy' are only destroying its credibility with the American people.

item.title: Trump to sign executive order to abolish the Department of Education
item.description: President Donald Trump followed through on campaign promises to eradicate the Department of Education.

item.title: Faith leaders gather around Trump to pray in Oval Office: 'incredible day'
item.description: Faith leaders from across the country visited President Donald Trump on Wednesday at the White House, where they prayed in the Oval Office.

item.title: We Must Restore the U.S. Agency for Global Media, Not Eliminate It
item.description: Repressive regimes have failed to block the agency’s promotion of freedom around the world. Doing so ourselves could have drastic consequences.
